headline: School sports - how much PE is taught to your children?
text: The coalition is under attack over its investment in school sport. Education secretary Michael Gove provoked an outcry when he drastically cut funding for schools sports partnerships, which have worked hard to increase the quality and range of sport available to children. If you are a parent or teacher, help us to understand what is happening with school sports provision across the UK by sharing your experiences in the form below.  We want to find out if and how it differs between regions and schools and how much things have changed since you were at school. We will not publish your contact details or identify you or your child in any reporting of the results of this survey.   Loading...
